subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Henrik Lundqvist made 39 saves and Viktor Stalberg, J. T. Miller and Rick Nash scored as the host Rangers edged the Boston Bruins, 3-2, in preseason play.
snippet: Henrik Lundqvist made 39 saves and Viktor Stalberg, J. T. Miller and Rick Nash scored as the host Rangers edged the Boston Bruins, 3-2, in preseason play.
